name: davinci-eight
description: WebGL library for mathematical physics using Geometric Algebra

scripts.build: trash build && tsc -p tsconfig.main.json && tsc -p tsconfig.module.json && yarn build:browser
scripts.build:browser: rollup --config rollup.config.js --format umd --name 'EIGHT' --output build/browser/index.js && sorcery -i build/browser/index.js && cp src/index.d.ts build/browser
scripts.unit: trash test && tsc -p tsconfig.json && karma start
scripts.test: yarn lint && yarn unit && nyc check-coverage --lines 40 --functions 30 --branches 20
scripts.coverage: trash test && tsc -p tsconfig.json && nyc karma start && nyc report --reporter=html && opn coverage/index.html
scripts.docs:typedoc: trash docs && typedoc src/index.ts --excludePrivate --excludeNotExported --mode file --theme minimal --out docs

scripts-info.unit: Build the library and run unit tests
scripts-info.test: Lint, build, and test the library
scripts-info.watch: Watch source files, rebuild library on changes, rerun relevant tests
scripts-info.coverage: Run tests, generate the HTML coverage report, and open it in a browser
scripts-info.docs: Generate HTML API documentation and open it in a browser
scripts-info.pages: Generate HTML API documentation and push it to GitHub Pages
scripts-info.changelog: Bump package.json version, update CHANGELOG.md, tag a release
